channel.title: Python on Jinkyu Koo
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Jinkyu Koo

item.title: Python in half an hour
item.description: In what follows in this tutorial, the result of a statement is expressed in the form of #result#, unless otherwise mentioned. Basic arithmetic operations # Comments start with a hash sign (#). 1 + 2 # Addition 1 / 2 #0# Division 1 / 2. #0.5# If either one of the numbers in a division is a float, # so does the result. 3 % 2 #1# Modulus 2 ** 3 #8# Power.
